author: mark vasz
comment: Very slik design. The date in the complications doesn't keep up but fixed it by using a 3rd party app to fill in the correct date (androidwear  clock).

author: Chris Caish
comment: Date complication doesn't update on new day. Have to switch faces then switch back to get correct date.

author: Bradley Livingston
comment: App crashes on Huawei watch. Date complication doesn't work, and 3rd party complications don't show.

author: Cel Thys
comment: Liked it a lot, only problem is widgets/dials are a little dark compared to the rest of the watch. Minimal ambient looks nice

author: K Leviathan
comment: Fix the date complication!

author: Ameerun Nessa
comment: Doesn't connect to LG Gear R

author: Zsigmond-Attila Szász
comment: Very stylish. I noticed one bug so far: the date complication doesn't update automatically, I have to change the watch face and then back in order to update the date complication.

author: Steven Roberts
comment: Will not install on my lg g watch r. Installs on the phone but cannot get the watch face. Have emailed the developer but no response therefore 1 star. Absolute rubbish.

author: Istvan Szarka
comment: Beautiful watchface, but app keeps crashing! Cannot open it any more!

author: J. S.
comment: This developer is awesome. I've bought 90% of all his watch faces because they're classy and stylish. He's the only one who knows how to make something that makes your watch shine!

author: Colin Whiteside
comment: Good, but since Android Wear 2.0 it doesn't update the date complication.

author: rashid Almarri
comment: i cant get the watch face . i what my money back

author: Alexander Petrov
comment: Very good, but the date doesn't change automatically. This is the only reason I rate it as 4 stars.

author: Slava Panevchik
comment: Digital clock shows wrong time

author: calcium chloride
comment: This version doesn't keep custom settings on my watch, Huawei classic.

author: jason rojas
comment: Like it but date won't update on huweai watch

author: Robin Gibbs
comment: Does not push through to Moto 360

author: Robert Sandham
comment: Good, but numerals and dials too dim.

author: Charles Barnes
comment: I like the design and the fact I can use Google fit as my step counter.  On the downside the numerals and dials are quite dim with no way to make them brighter.  Also, can we get the weather conditions as well as the temp?  PS: my watch is a moto 360.
title: Nice but could use some tweaks

author: Yannis D
comment: Simple and nice design with various customizations.  One major problem is that the brightness, even at its highest level (6) is not bright enough.  So, forget being able to tell the time outdoors on a sunny day (watch: Huawei)

author: Halen Williams
comment: I like Skymaster the most, but this watchface has the exact options for dials that I want. The ambient mode is also very clean and nice looking. The only thing that bothers me is the text and content looks too large for the small dial. Either the text needs to be downsized or the rings themselves enlarged. The battery dials also look imbalanced, with the icon under the second character and the text pushed to the top of the ring. The progress indicator also stands out too much. I wish that could be disabled.
title: My favourite of your designs.

comment: I really wish this would integrate into the Android wear watchface section like other downloaded watchfaces, instead of act like it's own app. I'm a minimalist and hate seeing unnecessary icons.
title: Beautiful watchface but..

author: J. Nathaniel Smith
comment: I like the simplicity of this design, but I would really like the ability to change the colour of the numbers and tick marks.  You can change the second hand colour, why not the face details as well?
title: Simple and clean, but can be hard to read.

author: Bart Childers
comment: Updating my review - the step-counter widget is updating just fine now. I'll give it a 5-star review if you can tell me how to make the widgets readable in direct sunlight when the face goes into 'active' mode. They are too dim to read currently.  Gorgeous watch face otherwise!

author: Joseph Bery
comment: The stock watch faces are rubbish and this one brings out the life of my Moto 360 and doesn't show the flat tire it's totally worth the money
title: It's an excellent watch face

author: Owen Smith
comment: Grim. Only 99p but still wasted
title: Doesn't work with lg

author: Shane Hall
comment: Incredibly sleek design, looks great and seems to be more responsive coming out of dim mode than the stock faces.

reply.author: Zuhanden
reply.content: Hey Shane, the bug should be fixed in the latest release. Could you update to the new version and let me know whether it works? Thanks, Hans

title: Date is fixed, but steps and weather won't reset

author: Bethany S.
comment: Only thing missing is interchangeable watch band.
title: Options

author: Dan Alcantara
comment: I love this watch face design, it is perfect for a classic looking smart watch like Moto 360 2nd gen.

author: Eric Kaiser
comment: But Celsius only works on the widget, not the watch face
title: I quite like it...

author: Peter Yates
comment: It really doesn't, it's a waste of space. Uninstalled.
title: Why does this need an app icon in the drawer?

author: Tyler James
comment: I'm always trying out new faces but this is the one I always go back to, I love it
title: My go to

author: Tomasz To
comment: Very nice,  almost perfect.
title: Very nice

author: Michael Shaune
comment: Better than the original faces.
title: Huawie watch

author: Angel Peguero
comment: Looks awesome
title: One of the best watch face

author: scott wallser
comment: Looks perfect. Very smart.

author: Eru Teya
comment: Simplicity made sexy
Simple and elegant.

author: Joseph Hutchinson
comment: The only real negative for me is the grey text (in particular the date) in the "dials", which can be hard to see even when the sun's not too bright. Otherwise, looks great!
title: Great looking watch face

author: jacob authement
comment: Been using this face for over a week now. Battery life is pretty bad with it. I used to go through a day with 30-40 percent. Now, I'm getting the 15% warning around 14 hours wear. Also, date circle does not auto update.
title: Really like this watch face
